title: OT73: I Lik The Thred
summary:
Key ideas
- Successful SSC meetups in Austin and Oslo recently
- Check the meetup thread for times and places in your city
- Comments of the week include K explaining scuba divers behavior when running out of air and John Nerst calculating SSC readers per capita by city
- A $15,000 donation was made to MSF by the author last year
- Suggestions to split the comments section into two to manage the large number of comments

Key learnings
- Meetups organized by SSC readers can exceed expectations in attendance
- The author made a significant donation to charity last year
- There are concerns over the large number of comments in the open thread

Key questions
- How can the comment section be managed more effectively?
- Are readers interested in splitting the comment section into two separate threads?
- What impact do the SSC meetups have on readership engagement and community building?
